data.content:
Danh từ
sự hoãn, sự hoãn lại

noun
plural -ments
the act of allowing something to be delayed or deferred: such as
official permission to pay for something at a later time [count]
She requested a six-month deferment on her loan. [noncount]
She requested deferment of her loan.
official permission to do required military service at a later time [count]
a draft deferment
He received a college/student deferment. [=permission to finish school before entering the military] [noncount]
the policies of military deferment
